name: 地名學研究
goals: master the relevant theories and methods of toponymic studies at home and abroad.
Comprehend the significance of place names in the history of Taiwan.
Engage in toponyms for the study of Taiwan history.
syllabus:
(Tentativeschedules)

Wk l. Introduction

Wk 2. Basic conceptof Toponymics (and Onomastics)

Wk 3-4  Correlation of Taiwan Place Names with Chinese Characters and Phonetics

Wk 5 Commemorative Place Names in Taiwan

Wk 6-7 Commemorative Place Names outside Taiwan

Wk 8-9 Place Names and Place Name Changes in Taiwan History

Wk 10-13  Contemporary Street-naming in postwar Taiwan

Wk 14-15 Classparticipants’ oral presentation

Wk 16. Final Report
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
